assetProfile.address2: Xixi Legu Creative Industry Park No. 738 Wener West Road Xihu District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of cement and building materials in China. The company offers dry powder mortar; and clinker, concrete, aggregate and other building materials, as well as oil well special cement, which are used in railways, highways, airports, water conservancy projects, oil wells, and other infrastructure or large-scale heavy industrial facilities projects, as well as urban real estate development and construction, and rural markets. It also engages in the sale of merchandise; mineral resource mining; power generation; nonmetallic mining and dressing; processing and sale of stones; import and export of goods and technologies; manufacture and sale of equipment for environmental protection; waste heat and residual pressure power generation; real estate development; asset management; property management; and equity investment and venture capital business. In addition, the company is involved in the technical development and technical consultation of energy-saving and environmental protection equipment; research and service of co-processing solid waste technology with cement production line; and provision of logistics services. The company was formerly known as Baiyin Copper Commercial Building (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd in April 2013. Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd was founded in 1978 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Hui  Qu
